ourStoryDesc: Foundations of Prevention (FOP) is a leading Saudi manufacturer of personal protective equipment (PPE), with a special focus on head protection solutions in industrial environments. The company was founded to meet the growing demand for reliable safety equipment in the rapidly growing construction and industrial sectors in the Kingdom. FOP ensures that every product reflects engineering precision, comfort, and safety.

certEN397Desc: European standard for industrial safety helmets, ensuring protection against impacts, penetration, and extreme temperatures.
certANSIDesc: American National Standard for industrial head protection, covering Type I and Type II helmets with various impact ratings.
certISODesc: International quality management standard ensuring consistent product quality and continuous improvement processes.
certSASODesc: Saudi Arabian Standards Organization certification, meeting local regulatory requirements for product safety and quality.
